title: Fps drops to 3 at the start of a game
body: Hey guys, need urgent help, at completely random times at the start of a game my fps will drop to 2 or 3, for no apparent reason at all, my ping stays around 50 aswell,  so no clue why this would happen, the only way i know how to fix this at the moment is to restart my computer. PLLease heeelp

replies.body:
Hey there,

There could be many potential causes of low framerate issues with the game. Could you try the following and get back to me.

* Ensure your Graphics Drivers are up to date.
* Close any unneeded background programs before starting a game.
* [Repair your install](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#wq5).

Does your computer get hot while playing league? It is possible the heat is causing your system to throttle to prevent overheating. Next time while playing I recommend monitoring your GPU/CPU temps, there are many tools available to do this however my choice is [SpeedFan](http://www.almico.com/sfdownload.php).
